long.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,el,et,fa,fil,gu,he,hi,hr,:
Qooly Video Downloader is a powerful and user-friendly browser extension designed to help you download videos from popular websites quickly and easily. With Qooly, you can save m3u8 streams to MP4 format, ensuring your favorite videos are always available offline.

With its user-friendly interface and robust features, Qooly Video Downloader is an essential tool for anyone who values flexibility and control over their video content. Say goodbye to buffering issues and data limitations, and hello to a seamless, high-speed downloading experience. Whether you're a student, professional, content creator, or casual viewer, Qooly empowers you to enjoy your video content on your terms, anytime and anywhere.

Features:
📥 Capture and Convert
Seamlessly captures m3u8 video streams from web pages and downloads them directly to your computer in MP4 format.

🎙️ Live Stream Recording
Records live streaming videos from the web and saves them to your computer in MP4 format for later viewing.

📹 Static Video Identification
Automatically identifies and downloads static videos on web pages to your PC.

🚀 High-Speed Downloads
Utilizes multi-threaded download technology, achieving speeds of up to 10M/s on a good network connection.

🖥️ Wide Compatibility
Supports downloads from popular websites including Vimeo, TikTok, Facebook, DailyMotion, Twitch, Rumble, and many more.

🌐 Free and Accessible
Completely free to use, making it accessible to everyone.

You can use our video downloaders for various reasons, including:

1. Offline Viewing
Watching videos without an internet connection is especially useful for travel or areas with poor connectivity.

2. Archiving Content
To save videos for future reference or personal archives, ensuring access even if the content is removed from the web.

3. Educational Purposes
To download instructional videos, tutorials, or lectures for offline study and review.

4. Content Creation
To gather video clips for creating new content, such as compilations, presentations, or remixes.

5. Avoiding Ads
To watch videos without interruptions from ads or other distractions.

6. Sharing
To share videos with others who may not have easy access to streaming services or websites.

7. Research and Analysis
To analyze video content for research, critique, or professional purposes without relying on continuous internet access.

8. Saving Live Streams
To capture and save live streaming events that may not be available for replay later.

9. Convenience
To have quick access to videos without the need to navigate to the original website each time.

Enjoy the convenience of offline video access with Qooly Video Downloader, your go-to tool for capturing and saving online videos effortlessly. Whether you're looking to watch your favorite content during a commute, preserve educational material for future study, or create your video compilations, Qooly makes it simple and efficient.

Experience the freedom of offline access and make Qooly Video Downloader your trusted companion for all your video downloading needs. Download now and start building your video library today!

Note:
- due to the privacy policies and terms of use of Google and YouTube, videos are not downloaded from YouTube. However, you can use it to download and save any video you want on many other websites.
